DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study efficacy and safety of AZD1981 in patients with Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of AZD1981 in Patients With Moderate to Severe Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
DOC.criteria: FEV1 between 30 and 80% of predicted normal value postbronchodilator (GOLD stages 2 and 3) Clinical diagnosis of COPD Other clinically relevant disease or disorders Exacerbation of COPD within 30 days
